languages.text: "Не сомневался в выборе Вашей Светлости. Чувствую, нас ждет плодотворное сотрудничество, а Даргонус — процветание. Я немедленно передам все ваши распоряжения, о Вольный Торговец. Да осветит золото Трона ваш путь".

traits.locale_text: "Не сомневался в выборе Вашей Светлости. Чувствую, нас ждет плодотворное сотрудничество, а Даргонус — процветание. Я немедленно передам все ваши распоряжения, о Вольный Торговец. Да осветит золото Трона ваш путь".

languages.text: "I never doubted Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s decision. I can tell that the future holds a fruitful partnership for us, and prosperity for all Dargonus. I shall immediately relay all your orders, most gracious Rogue Trader. May the gold of the Throne illuminate your path."
languages.original_text: "Не сомневался в выборе Вашей Светлости. Чувствую, нас ждет плодотворное сотрудничество, а Даргонус — процветание. Я немедленно передам все ваши распоряжения, о Вольный Торговец. Да осветит золото Трона ваш путь".

traits.locale_text: "I never doubted Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s decision. I can tell that the future holds for us a fruitful partnership, and for Dargonus — prosperity. I shall immediately deliver all your orders, O Rogue Trader. May the gold of the Throne illuminate your path."

"I never doubted Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s decision. I can tell that the future holds for us a fruitful partnership, and for Dargonus — prosperity. I shall immediately deliver all your orders, O Rogue Trader. May the gold of the Throne illuminate your path."

"I never doubted Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s decision. I can tell that the future holds a fruitful partnership for us, and prosperity for all Dargonus. I shall immediately relay all your orders, most gracious Rogue Trader. May the gold of the Throne illuminate your path."

"I never doubted Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s decision. I can tell that the future holds a fruitful partnership for us, and prosperity for all Dargonus. I shall immediately relay all your orders, most gracious Rogue Trader. May the gold of the Throne illuminate your path."

"I never doubted Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s decision. I can tell that the future holds a fruitful partnership for us, and prosperity for all Dargonus. I shall immediately relay all your orders, most gracious Rogue Trader. May the gold of the Throne illuminate your path."

languages.text: “我从来没有怀疑过您的英明决定，大人。我可以向您保证，我们未来的合作将会带来丰硕的成果，将会带领整个达戈努斯走向繁荣。我将立即传达您的所有命令，最仁慈的行商浪人。愿黄金王座照亮您的道路。”
languages.original_text: "I never doubted Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s decision. I can tell that the future holds a fruitful partnership for us, and prosperity for all Dargonus. I shall immediately relay all your orders, most gracious Rogue Trader. May the gold of the Throne illuminate your path."

traits.locale_text: “我从来没有怀疑过您的英明决定，大人。我可以向您保证，我们未来的合作将会带来丰硕的成果，将会带领整个达戈努斯走向繁荣。我将立即传达您的所有命令，最仁慈的行商浪人。愿黄金王座照亮您的道路。”

languages.text: «Nunca he dudado de su decisión, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Puedo ver que el futuro nos tiene reservada una asociación fructífera y una gran prosperidad para Dargonus. Comerciante Independiente, me aseguraré de transmitir sus órdenes inmediatamente. Que el oro del Trono ilumine su camino».
languages.original_text: "I never doubted Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s decision. I can tell that the future holds a fruitful partnership for us, and prosperity for all Dargonus. I shall immediately relay all your orders, most gracious Rogue Trader. May the gold of the Throne illuminate your path."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca he dudado de su decisión, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Puedo ver que el futuro nos tiene reservada una asociación fructífera y una gran prosperidad para Dargonus. Comerciante Independiente, me aseguraré de transmitir sus órdenes inmediatamente. Que el oro del Trono ilumine su camino».

languages.text: 「さすがの判断力です、陛下。我が一族との協力関係は実り多いものとなり、ダルゴナス全体の繁栄につながると確信しています。ただちにあなたの司令を通達いたします、自由開拓者様。王座の金の輝きが、あなたの未来を明るく照らしてくれますように」
languages.original_text: "I never doubted Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s decision. I can tell that the future holds a fruitful partnership for us, and prosperity for all Dargonus. I shall immediately relay all your orders, most gracious Rogue Trader. May the gold of the Throne illuminate your path."

traits.locale_text: 「さすがの判断力です、陛下。我が一族との協力関係は実り多いものとなり、ダルゴナス全体の繁栄につながると確信しています。ただちにあなたの司令を通達いたします、自由開拓者様。王座の金の輝きが、あなたの未来を明るく照らしてくれますように」

languages.text: "Ich habe nie an der Entscheidung Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} gezweifelt. Die Zukunft hält für uns eine fruchtbare Partnerschaft bereit, und Wohlstand für ganz Dargonus. Ich werde all Eure Befehle umgehend weiterleiten, überaus {mf|großzügiger Freihändler|großzügige Freihändlerin}. Möge das Gold des Throns Euren Pfad erleuchten."
languages.original_text: "I never doubted Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s decision. I can tell that the future holds a fruitful partnership for us, and prosperity for all Dargonus. I shall immediately relay all your orders, most gracious Rogue Trader. May the gold of the Throne illuminate your path."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nie an der Entscheidung Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} gezweifelt. Die Zukunft hält für uns eine fruchtbare Partnerschaft bereit, und Wohlstand für ganz Dargonus. Ich werde all Eure Befehle umgehend weiterleiten, überaus {mf|großzügiger Freihändler|großzügige Freihändlerin}. Möge das Gold des Throns Euren Pfad erleuchten."

languages.text: « Je savais que Votre Seigneurie en déciderait ainsi. Je peux d'ores et déjà dire qu'avec un partenariat tel que le nôtre, l'avenir et la prospérité de Dargonus sont assurés. Sur ce, je m'en vais transmettre vos ordres, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Puisse l'or du Trône illuminer votre chemin. »
languages.original_text: "I never doubted Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s decision. I can tell that the future holds a fruitful partnership for us, and prosperity for all Dargonus. I shall immediately relay all your orders, most gracious Rogue Trader. May the gold of the Throne illuminate your path."

traits.locale_text: « Je savais que Votre Seigneurie en déciderait ainsi. Je peux d'ores et déjà dire qu'avec un partenariat tel que le nôtre, l'avenir et la prospérité de Dargonus sont assurés. Sur ce, je m'en vais transmettre vos ordres, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Puisse l'or du Trône illuminer votre chemin. »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin kararından hiç şüphe etmedim. Geleceğin bizler için verimli bir iş birliği, Dargonus içinse refah getireceğini şimdiden söyleyebilirim. Çok değerli Hür Tacir, emirlerinizi derhâl iletiyorum. Taht'ın altınları yolunuzu aydınlatsın."
languages.original_text: "I never doubted Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s decision. I can tell that the future holds a fruitful partnership for us, and prosperity for all Dargonus. I shall immediately relay all your orders, most gracious Rogue Trader. May the gold of the Throne illuminate your path."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin kararından hiç şüphe etmedim. Geleceğin bizler için verimli bir iş birliği, Dargonus için ise refah getireceğini şimdiden söyleyebilirim. Çok değerli Hür Tacir, emirlerinizi derhâl iletiyorum. Yolunuzu Taht'ın altınları aydınlatsın."
